events.title: Spring Tennis Mixer & Social
events.description: Kick off the spring season with our biggest social event! Mixed doubles round-robin, brunch, and prizes. All skill levels welcome.

events.title: Serve & Volley Clinic
events.description: Master the art of serve and volley with Coach Lexi. Focus on technique, footwork, and net game strategy.

events.title: Doubles Tournament
events.description: Competitive doubles tournament for 3.5+ level players. Prizes for winners and finalists. Lunch included.

events.title: Wine & Tennis Night
events.description: An evening of casual tennis, wine tasting, and socializing. No partner needed - we'll match you up!
